Blood Money
Genre(s)
Thrash Metal
Lyrical theme(s)
Violence, Myths, Death
Origin 	Formed in 	Last label 	Status
United Kingdom (Manchester) 	1984 	Ebony Records 	Split-up
Last known line-up
Danny Foxx - Vocals (China Beach)
Gramie Dee - Guitars (Wolfbane, Morgueazm, Xanthoma)
Dale Lee - Bass (Wolfbane, Xanthoma)
Brett Avok - Drums (now in - Morgueazm)
Former/past member(s)
J. Colin Clarke - Drums (1984 - 1985)
Additional notes
After Blood Money split up, Danny Foxx went on to form his own band and then China Beach, Gramie Dee and Brett Avok formed Morgueazm, and Dale Lee is collaborating with Gramie Dee on a death/doom metal project called Xanthoma.

Their song ``I Was Wrong`` from the first demo was released in 2004 on ``Total Metal Attack`` compilation cd
